modName: Full blacksmith equipment in every town
summary: You always wanted to smelt down ore while stumbling around Solitude? You tried to improve your new daedric armor, but Dawnstar lacks a working bench? No more unnecessary loadingscreens!
descriptionHtml:
Who doesn't know that situation: You want to sell some picked up junk on your way through the world and remember something terribad; Morthal lacks a blacksmith AND a general goods store!

FEAR NOT MY DEAR FRIENDS,

because this little file adds a lot of missing blacksmith equipment to the towns of Skyrim, making a blacksmiths life even more comfortable.


Content:
+ a smelter in Solitude. It's right in front of the forge, directly under the chimney.
+ a smelter in Falkreath. Search near behind the blacksmiths house.
+ a smelter in Riften. You'll find it in Balimunds basement.
+ a working bench in Dawnstar. Located right beneath the forge.
+ an entire forge, including a whetstone, working bench, smelter and Blacksmith for Morthal. His name is Bern Adaman and he's even selling items to you. You'll find it next to Falions House, under the open roof, similar to dawnstar.

I left out Winterhold for now, since a working blacksmith would overshadow the "city's" miserable condition.

Compability:
Obvious incompability with other town overhauls. Also, try loading it after any civil war overhauls, since a few spawnpoints had to be moved a few meters.

Bugs:
The Blacksmith might has a hard time walking past the forge, since he keeps walking into the water cooler.

Installation:
Unzip it into the Skyrim folder (not Skyrimdata) or use the mod manager.
author: BlueTobimon56
